NAME: ctcyan PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color cyan.

ctgray.pro

NAME: ctgray PURPOSE: Allocate/return a gray level.

ctgreen.pro

NAME: ctgreen PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color green.

ctlookup.pro

NAME: ctlookup PURPOSE: Returns a string giving the name of a color corresponding to a given color index.

ctmod.pro

NAME: ctmod PURPOSE: To get display visual type (8 or 24 bit) and reserve a number of colors for overlay plotting in the lookup table (for 8 bit).

ctorange.pro

NAME: ctorange PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color orange.

ctpink.pro

NAME: ctpink PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color pink.

ctpurple.pro

NAME: ctpurple PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color purple.

ctred.pro

NAME: ctred PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color red.

ctuser.pro

NAME: ctuser PURPOSE: Returns a user color that was allocated using ctmod.

ctwhite.pro

NAME: ctwhite PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color white.

ctyellow.pro

NAME: ctyellow PURPOSE: To allocate/return the color yellow.
